verbs.description: [ARG1: Special Counsel Robert Mueller] [V: appears] [C-ARG1: to be turning his focus to President Donald Trump ’s longtime adviser Roger Stone , bringing in a string of Stone ’s associates in recent weeks for questioning about his activities during the 2016 campaign] .
